mapper.select: /*전체 게시글 조회*/ SELECT board_idx AS boardIdx, title, hit_cnt AS hitCnt, created_datetime AS createdDatetime FROM t_board WHERE deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY board_idx DESC;
mapper.insert: /*하나의 게시글 등록*/ INSERT INTO t_board ( title, `contents`, created_datetime, creator_id ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, NOW(), 'id001' );
mapper.select: /*하나의 게시글 상세 조회*/ SELECT t.board_idx AS boardIdx, t.title, t.`contents`, t.hit_cnt AS hitCnt, t.created_datetime AS createdDatetime, t.creator_id AS creatorId FROM t_board AS t WHERE t.board_idx = #{boardIdx};
